# Bewildering Mischance (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Adept Spells|Adept 5]], [[5th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 5]], [[5th Level Shugenja Spells|Shugenja 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One living creature

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Complete Champion (WotC), pg. 116

*Your deityâ€™s laughter rains down on your suddenly clumsy foe.*

*Bewildering mischance* causes extreme bad luck to befall the target. For the duration of the spell, the subject must roll each saving throw, attack roll, and skill check twice, keeping the lower of the two rolls.
